body.query: FROM events | eval ip_str = mv_concat("invalid_", to_string(ip)) | ENRICH networks-policy ON ip_str | sort @timestamp | KEEP ip, name, department, message

Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-9.1.0-0405fb088c4cb83350eb955863f9d928d10a42af "Line 1:68: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'invalid_' is not an IP string literal."
